content:
SizingType Enum

Definition

Specifies how elements with a bitmap background will adjust to fill a bounds.

In this Article

public enum SizingType
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
SizingType

Remarks

The SizingType values represent the return values of the GetEnumValue method when it is called with an argument value of System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty.

Fields

FixedSize

The element cannot be resized.
Stretch

The background image stretches to fill the bounds.
Tile

The background image repeats the pattern to fill the bounds.
